content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mary. I understand that you are looking for a reasonable rental price. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my returns on this investment. Would you be able to provide me with an offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I was wondering if you could give me a price range. That would give me a better idea of what is possible.

Also, I would like to clarify that I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I am looking for a long term rental, for at least one year.

Lastly, I would like to know if the apartment is furnished or unfurnished.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Certainly, Mary. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim, I would expect a rental price between €800 and €1000 per month.

As for your dependability and responsibility, I appreciate your interest in this apartment. However, as a landlord, I am looking for tenants who can provide references or proof of their ability to pay rent on time.

Regarding the furnishings, the apartment is currently unfurnished, but I am open to discussing options for furnishing it if that would be of interest to you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand the rental price range you've provided. I would like to negotiate for the lowest possible price within that range. Can we discuss a specific offer?

Regarding my dependability and responsibility, I have a good credit score and a stable income. I have also lived in apartments before and have always paid rent on time. I am interested in this apartment and I would like to express my interest in signing a long term lease agreement.

Regarding the furnishings, I am open to discussing options for furnishing the apartment, but I am also open to renting it unfurnished. My preference is to rent it unfurnished, but I am willing to consider options for furnishings if that would make it more comfortable for me.

Lastly, I would like to clarify that I am looking for a one year lease agreement, with the possibility of renewing the lease for another year.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mary. Based on your credit score and stable income, I am willing to consider your proposal for the rental price. However, I must emphasize that the rental price range I provided earlier is based on current market rates and I cannot guarantee that I can lower the price any further.

Regarding your request for a one year lease agreement with the possibility of renewal for another year, I am open to discussing that option with you. However, I would require a security deposit to cover any potential damages or late rent payments.

Regarding the furnishings, I am open to discussing options for furnishing the apartment, but I must emphasize that any additional costs for furniture will be the responsibility of the tenant.

In summary, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price, but I cannot guarantee that I can lower it any further. I require a security deposit and I am open to discussing a one year lease agreement with the possibility of renewal for another year. Regarding the furnishings, I am open to discussing options, but any additional costs for furniture will be the responsibility of the tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
